Title: Sawasdee Bangkok
Director: Aditya Assarat, Kongdej Jaturanrasamee, Pen-Ek Ratanaruang, Wisit Sasanatieng
Writer: Aditya Assarat (screenplay), Kongdej Jaturanrasamee (screenplay), Pen-Ek Ratanaruang (screenplay), Wisit Sasanatieng (screenplay)
Plot: Four Thai directors give their take on Thailand's capital city of Bangkok.
